mapper.insert: insert into club(club_name, club_image, club_content, club_loc, club_type, club_master) values(#{name}, #{image}, #{content}, #{loc}, #{type}, #{master})
mapper.update: update club set club_name=#{name}, club_image=#{image}, club_content=#{content}, club_loc=#{loc}, club_type=#{type}, club_master=#{master} where club_no=#{no}
mapper.select: select * from club order by club_no desc, club_regdate desc
